The flexibility of use class E risks undermining that supply, so the policy supports the use of planning conditions that restrict changes of use. 15.34 Part 7 aims to prevent long-term vacancy caused by high fit- out costs and lack of supporting infrastructure deterring interest from potential tenants. 234 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO POLICIES 15.35 Part 7(a) promotes flexibility to minimise the risk of spaces becoming vacant and ensuring that they can adapt to changing market demands. 15.36 Part 7(b) seeks to ensure that space is provided to meet the needs of local independent businesses, which may require smaller spaces.
